title: New CISO responsibilities: supply chain. [CSO Perspectives]
description: Rick Howard, the Cyberwire’s CSO and Chief Analyst, is joined by Hash Table members Ann Johnson, Microsoft’s Corporate VP on Security, Compliance, & Identity, and Ted Wagner, the SAP National Security Services CISO, t0 discuss supply chain as a new CISO responsibility.
